The claim states that: 91 percent of Latinos support the DREAM Act, which allows undocumented youth to attend college," but Marco Rubio opposes it. This aspect of the claim was examined to verify the authenticity.
The ad also states that: 81 percent of Latinos oppose SB 1070, Arizona’s racial profiling law." This claim was also evaluated to determine its accuracy.
Another aspect of the claim is that: 88 percent of Latinos support legalization for undocumented immigrants." This statement was analyzed to establish its veracity.
Lastly: the claim asserts that "when it comes to voting for what we care about most, no somos Rubios," implying that Latinos do not support Marco Rubio. The accuracy of this statement was also assessed.
